titleStmt.title: The battailes of Crescey, and Poictiers vnder the leading of King Edward the Third of that name; and his sonne Edward Prince of Wales, named the Blacke. By Charles Allen, sometime of Sidney Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Aleyn, Charles, d. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho: Purfoot for T. K[night],

notesStmt.note: Caption title, leaf C6, reads: The battaie of Pioctiers vnder Edward, sirnanamed [sic] the Blacke Prince.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
